name: Error#54
summary:
'Error#54' - first person indie horror game in P.T style, developed by only one person during two months. #horror

approximate time of the game is 10 minutes

have fun!


Controls :

    WASD or ↑←↓→ to move
    E to interact
    F to enable/disable flashlight
    Right mouse button to cancle interact
    G to add item to inventory
    ESC to enable/disable game menu

also you can use joystick (dualshock or xbox controller)

    left stick to move
    right stick to rotate camera
    X to interact
    ◎ to cancle interact
    ◻ to add item to inventory
    'Select' to enable/disable flashlight
